name: Homeworld inspired 2d Html preview
description:
Html preview for all assets of Homeworld inspired 2d spacecrafts:

- drag and drop objects with mouse

- zoom in, zoom out with mouse wheel

- appear/hide spacecrafts turrets slots with enter key

- animate turret firing with space key

- flip objects to the left with left arrow or Q key

- flip objects to the right with right arrow or D key

New spacecrafts comming soon 😉
